== Vazhakkala (CT) (628008) ==

Vazhakkala (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 12.87 sq. km. and harbouring 12762 households with total population of 51242 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 2 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 225 km. Male population is 25033 and female population is 26209. Scheduled Caste population is 3105 and Scheduled Tribes population is 268. Census Location Code of the town is 628008<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 2 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 2 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam at a distance of 9 km.
